title: Bait e Jamila Project
content:
On 28th September 2024, Taqdeer e Naw organized a special visit to Bait-e-Jamila Orphanage in Multan, Punjab, as part of our ongoing efforts in social welfare. The purpose of this visit was to bring moments of happiness, warmth, and human connection to the children residing there.
Our team spent quality time with the children—engaging in friendly conversations, playful activities, and shared laughter. To brighten their day, we brought along delicious treats and gifted them coloring books, pencils, and toys. These small tokens were aimed at nurturing their creativity and providing a joyful break from their routine.
The children’s smiles and enthusiasm were heartening, reminding us of the impact a simple act of kindness can make. This visit not only brought joy to the children but also reinforced our commitment to compassion and social responsibility. We are deeply grateful to everyone who contributed to making this day meaningful and memorable.
Let’s continue to work together to create a more caring and inclusive world, one small act at a time.
